data.title: Park Authority
meta_keywords: find a picnic place in fairfax
data.meta_description: Fairfax County, Virginia - Fairfax County Park Authority Picnics
data.text:
Go to: https://fairfax.usedirect.com/FairfaxFCPAWeb/Facilities/AdvanceSearch.aspx or click the “Availability Calendar” button on any picnic page.

Select your desired date in the calendar box.

Type a park name in the search bar.

Scroll through the images and select a park.

HINT: Hover the cursor over a park’s image to see its location on the map.

HINT: Select “Park Info” to see more about a park.

Select a park by clicking the reserve button.

Select the “Reserve” or “Check Availability” button in the Facility Reservation section. A calendar with available dates will appear.

Select your desired facility along with the corresponding date and click on its green box.

HINT: Dates that appear in green are available. Use the date selector or green double arrows to see future dates.

HINT: Dates that appear in gray are available (typically within 10 days). Please submit a Picnic Permit Application.

HINT: Dates that appear in red are not available. Please select another date or unit.

HINT: Ignore the drop-down menu for the number of nights or select “1 Night”. Picnic reservations are for day use. Continue with your reservation.

HINT: Dates that appear in teal are available, but not web bookable. Please submit a Picnic Permit Application.

Click 'Reserve Unit' in the pop-up window.

Log in with a Parktakes account, or create a new account with a work or personal email.

On the Booking Details page, complete all applicable boxes in the “Extra Information” section. All fields with an asterisk (*) are required.

HINT: If you select Other Entertainment, Volleyball or Sports Bags add-ons (additional fees may apply) you will be contacted by staff to confirm your request once your picnic permit has been issued (typically within 10-14 days before your rental date). A finalized permit will be issued providing permission details, if approved and paid for.

HINT: If you receive an error before the Booking Details screen appears, you have likely chosen a reservation date that is within 10 days of the current date. Please select a new date or submit an application via Fax, Email, by mail or in person.

Please enter the maximum number of attendees for your event. If you have more attendees than a rental area can hold, you may need to book an additional location or change locations.

After completing all information, check the box indicating that you agree with the terms and conditions.

Select “Book Site”. Your shopping cart will appear.

Optional: To make another reservation, select “Reservations” at the top of the Shopping Cart page.

Optional: To add tickets for additional features such as Train, Carousel or Mini Golf, select “Tickets” at the top of the Shopping Cart Page.

Review your cart and select “Go to Checkout.”

Enter your payment.

Select “Complete."

A window will open verifying receipt of your reservation. You will receive an email with your receipt and a copy of the rules and regulations. Staff will be in touch to finalize your event if you have exceeded capacity or if you have requested additional extras. Do not book other entertainment beyond what is permitted.
